item.title: Heavy metal bin door does lock shut and needs a restrictor, 7th August
item.description:
The bin door is heavy and when the wind catches it it swings open and damages the frame and won't close. Needs a restrictor and bangs and makes alot of noise.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victoria Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree overhang ing, 7th August
item.description:
This tree is not maintained at all It’s just grows wild dropping apples all over the place it could hit anyone at anytime then they roll down the road and block drops . I appreciate you handled my first report and collected all The apples but it is continuous they tree need to be cut back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cranmore Road, Elmstead, London

item.title: Not been emptied in 6 weeks, 7th August
